body:
we don't need to actually provide a dummy command, we can put two Go files
at x/review/git-review with conflicting package names, so that go get fails with
some meaningful message. And we should update the website if possible.

// moved.go
package command_has_renamed // go get golang.org/x/review/git-codereview instead

// moved2.go
package moved

something like this, so that we don't actually install a git-review binary.
